results.definition: the process of shedding tears (usually accompanied by sobs or other inarticulate sounds)
examples: I hate to hear the crying of a child

results.definition: shed tears because of sadness, rage, or pain
examples: She cried bitterly when she heard the news of his death
The girl in the wheelchair wept with frustration when she could not get up the stairs

results.definition: having branches or flower heads that bend downward
examples: the pendulous branches of a weeping willow
lilacs with drooping panicles of fragrant flowers
